info.title: Boomerangme
info.description:
API for working with core Boomerangme objects. Any request can return an error code in the error variable.
Common errors for all requests:

| Code | Description |
| ------------- | ------------- |
| 1 | Invalid token specified |
| 2 | Card with the given serial number is not found |
| 3 | Card found but not owned by your company |
| 4 | Not all required request parameters are filled in |

post.description: List of card templates for your company
Creates a client for a card type.

phone.description: phone number. Required if no email

email.description: client email. Mandatory if not phone

post.description: Changes the client parameters for the card type.

phone.description: phone number. Required if no email

email.description: client email. Mandatory if not phone

post.description: Creates a card of a given template for a specific client.
The request takes the passSerialNumber parameter and returns card details.

post.summary: Check the existence of the card using the phone number
post.description: The query takes the parameters phone and idTemplate and returns 0 (does not exist) or 1 (exists) in the result parameter

post.summary: Card information using the cardholder's phone number
post.description: The query takes parameters phone and idTemplate and returns card data in the same format as the getPassInfo method

post.summary: Customer card information using phone number
post.description: Retrieves all cards within all templates available to your company by phone number and returns information on them.
By template ID and retrieves information about the clients and their card statuses according to the type of selection.

page.description: page number. Since the query returns no more than 100 clients, it serves to select the following ones.

selectionMode.description: Selection type. PassNotCreated - returns all clients with unissued cards. PassInstalled - all clients with cards installed and currently valid. passNotInstalled - all clients with issued, but not installed cards. passDeleted - all clients with issued but deleted cards.

post.description: The request takes the following parameters: passSerialNumber and page (optional). Returns the last 50 card transactions.

page.description: Page number. Because the request returns no more than 50 last operations, it serves to select the next page.

post.summary: Information about the client who installed the card
post.description: The request takes the passSerialNumber parameter.

post.summary: Get client list by card template
post.description: The query takes idTemplate and page (optional) parameters. It returns 10 clients registered in the given card template.

page.description: page number. Since the query returns no more than 10 clients, it is used to select the following ones.

post.description: This request depends on the type of card and includes general and special parameters. The request always takes the passSerialNumber parameter.

post.summary: Write off rewards on type 0 cards
post.description: With the card serial number it writes off all available rewards.

numberRewards.description: number of rewards to write off
